system.description:
chosen one

Destiny Playbook

Somehow, it seems like everything's fallen onto your shoulders. You didn't ask for this, but you're here, and no one else is. Rise up, Chosen One.

Requirements

To become the Chosen One, everyone must agree that you are important to the success of the Fellowship.

The Chosen One starts with Destiny Child.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-chosen-one.Item.HFpoGWD46xYam1lF]{Destiny child}

Advancement

When you Level Up, choose one Advancement from either this list or from your Basic Playbook, then mark it. You may only choose each option once.

  • Increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
  • Take a Custom Move from any Basic playbook.
  • Take a Chosen One Custom.
  • Take a Chosen One Custom.
  • Take a Chosen One Custom.

Custom Moves

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-chosen-one.Item.mFfuHjC5rXXMIysz]{Ancient allies}
